definition[0]: to say or do something in an attempt to prove that you are better or cleverer than someone else
example[0]: Too many MPs use debates as a chance to score political points.
example[1]: Advertising may be used to score points off the competition.
definition[1]: to do or say something to please someone or to make them respect you
